description: Poland, Hungary and the Czech Republic broke EU law by rejecting refugees, the top EU court says.
title: EU court rules against three states over refugees
title_page: EU court rules against three states over refugees - BBC News
maintext: The ECJ dismissed the countries' argument that the non-EU migrants could pose a security threat. That argument, the judges said, could only be applied in relation to a specific applicant, not to a whole group.
